arez.spy

Interface ObserverInfo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ElementInfo

    public interface ObserverInfo
extends ElementInfo
    A representation of a observer instance exposed to spy framework.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ComputedValueInfo asComputedValue()
      Convert the Observer to a ComputedValue.
      ComponentInfo getComponent()
      Return the component for the specified Observer.
      List<ObservableValueInfo> getDependencies()
      Return the list of dependencies of the Observer.
      Priority getPriority()
      Return the priority of the Observer.
      boolean isActive()
      Return true if the Observer is active.
      boolean isComputedValue()
      Return true if the Observer is a ComputedValue.
      boolean isReadOnly()
      Return true if the Observer will use a read-only transaction.
      boolean isRunning()
      Return true if the Observer is currently running.
      boolean isScheduled()
      Return true if the Observer is scheduled to run.

      • Methods inherited from interface arez.spy.ElementInfo

        getName, isDisposed

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Return true if the Observer is active. A normal observer is considered active if it is not disposed. An observer where isComputedValue() returns true if the observer is not disposed and either the ComputedValue is being observed or has been configured as a keepAlive ComputedValue.
        Returns:
        true if the Observer is active.

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Return true if the Observer is currently running.
        Returns:
        true if the Observer is currently running.

      • isScheduled

        boolean isScheduled()
        Return true if the Observer is scheduled to run.
        Returns:
        true if the Observer is scheduled to run.

      • isComputedValue

        boolean isComputedValue()
        Return true if the Observer is a ComputedValue.
        Returns:
        true if the Observer is a ComputedValue.

      • isReadOnly

        boolean isReadOnly()
        Return true if the Observer will use a read-only transaction.
        Returns:
        true if the Observer will use a read-only transaction.

      • getPriority

        @Nonnull
Priority getPriority()
        Return the priority of the Observer.
        Returns:
        the priority of the Observer.

      • asComputedValue

        ComputedValueInfo asComputedValue()
        Convert the Observer to a ComputedValue. This method should only be called if isComputedValue() returns true.
        Returns:
        the ComputedValue instance.

      • getDependencies

        @Nonnull
List<ObservableValueInfo> getDependencies()
        Return the list of dependencies of the Observer. The list is an immutable copy of the dependencies of the Observer. If the Observer is currently running (i.e. isRunning() returns true) then the dependencies are provisional and may be added to as transaction completes.
        Returns:
        the list of dependencies for the Observer.

      • getComponent

        @Nullable
ComponentInfo getComponent()
        Return the component for the specified Observer. This method should not be invoked if Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false.
        Returns:
        the component that contains Observer if any.
